metadata.title: CNSSI 1253 Security Categorization for National Security Systems
metadata.description: Extends FIPS 199 categorization for national security systems with additional controls and overlays

cia_baseline.description: CNSSI 1253 requires all three security objectives to be assessed independently. NSS systems have elevated minimums.

additional_overlays.name: Classified Information Overlay
additional_overlays.description: Additional controls for systems processing classified information
additional_overlays.applicable_when: system processes SECRET or higher data

additional_overlays.name: Intelligence Systems Overlay
additional_overlays.description: Controls for intelligence community systems processing SCI

additional_overlays.name: Cross-Domain Solution Overlay
additional_overlays.description: Controls for cross-domain transfer between classification levels
additional_overlays.applicable_when: system transfers data across security domains

additional_overlays.name: Space Platform Overlay
additional_overlays.description: Controls for satellite and space-based systems

control_elevation_rules.condition: system processes TOP SECRET or SCI data
system transfers data between classification levels
